department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: The Canada Border Services Agency acquired a contract for 50 units of transport restraint systems to be delivered in Rigaud, Quebec.
description: This procurement is for the delivery of transport restraint systems to be used by the Canada Border Services Agency. The system will be used in Rigaud, Quebec. The government has an option to purchase an additional 30 units within 48 months after the contract award.

**Government Tender Announcement**
==============================

### Reference Information
---------------

*   **Tender Title (English)**: Transport Restraint System
*   **Tender Title (French)**: Systèmes de contrainte pour le transport
*   **Reference Number**: WS4576420330-Doc4576858733

### Tender Details
-----------------

*   **Publication Date**: May 10, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date**: June 12, 2024, 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: July 31, 2024
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: None

### Commercial Details
----------------------

*   **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
*   **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

    *   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

    *   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

    *   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

### Contract Information
----------------------

*   **Contracting Authority**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
